address.streetAddress: Billy Bishop Toronto City Airport, 2 Eireann Quay, Toronto Hangar 1

description: Come Experience The Best Aerial Tour Service In Toronto!! We Fly All Year Round. Tour Agency-Serving the GTA Since 1997.

reviews.title: Really amazing experience
text: It's really amazing experience and staff are really really customer friendly.The view from the helicopter of Toronto was amazing

reviews.title: Super experience
text: For the first time I flew with a helicopter together with my wife and daughter (12 years old). Professional staff, from the arrival at the airport, the pre-flight briefing and the flight itself. Extraordinary experience, which I recommend to everyone.

reviews.title: Poor Photos Ruined the Romantic Package
text: Our experience with Helitour was very disappointing. We chose the Romantic Jewel package specifically to have great photos, but it was not worth the high cost. The flight was very short, and to make matters worse, we weren‚Äôt allowed to take our own photos beside the helicopter. Instead, only their photographer could take pictures, and she only took one quick shot for each photo without checking if our poses looked good. When we picked up the print, I was shocked to see that my eyes were closed, but when I asked for a retake, she refused! If I‚Äôd known the photos would turn out so poorly, I would have just saved my money and booked the cheaper, regular flight. Definitely wouldn‚Äôt recommend; not worth the price at all.

reviews.title: Nice view
text: Overall, a good experience. Helicopter was very basic. Pilot was non communicative, but skilled. Calling it a "tour" is misleading. Would be nice if the pilot could point out where you are in the city, some of the landmarks and any points of interest.

reviews.title: Very good
text: So good personal. I like it‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ÄúIt was a nice flight; the staff was very attentive and careful. Thank you sincerely.‚Äù

reviews.title: Amazing ride!
text: This helicopter ride is SO MUCH fun! The views are amazing, specially in a beautiful sunny day. The crew is super professional, and they make you feel super safe and well taken care from beginning to end. There's no better way to to see Toronto! Strongly recommended!

reviews.title: Wonderful experience!
text: Staff was wonderful and views were amazing! Have already recommended this to friends and family as it was an experience I will never forget!

reviews.title: Toronto Heli Tours
text: Amazing and breathtaking experience! Me and my kids enjoyed it very much! We hope to do it again next year!

reviews.title: "SURPRISE"
text: My wife and I celebrates the same birthday (August 15th.).  One of the surprise was a tour above the city.
(Toronto)
She is still thanking me and this experience will forever eched in the archives.
A shout out of appreciation to our pilot.

reviews.title: Great !!!!10/10
text: My experience was favorable from customer service at the front desk straight to helicopter. The flight was short but was worth the money the pilot was very friendly  when we enter the helicopter. We were please with all the security and safety that were  conducted.  I will give this experience 10/10 . Too enhance this experience during the tour I recommend  to share some information on places being seen in the tour eg cn tower the football field names the river etc

reviews.title: Don‚Äôt scroll past Heli Tour.  Book it!
text: I randomly found Heli Tour while trying to find something new & fun to do with my sister. My sister & I are super close and have monthly dates; just the two is us!

Although we are born & raised Torontoians, this tour did not disappoint. From the Heli Tour person waving at us because we got a little turned around in Billy Bishop to the orientation to the actual helicopter ride, it was a fantastic experience.

I would highly recommend to both tourists & those who have lived in Toronto for a long time. Our city is beautiful and this is a great way to appreciate it with a company that is exceptional. Thanks to Heli Tour and their amazing staff. I will definitely be back with other friends and family! #gettothechopper

reviews.title: Breathtaking
text: It was my first helicopter ride ever and I really enjoyed it. Wish I could do it again whenever I visit Canada  üòä

reviews.title: 4/5 stars
text: I have to say it was absolutely fantastic. Our pilot, she was absolutely amazing. The staff at the ground were really good. It is definitely worth it. I would give it 4/5 stars. I will just cut 1 star because when we got our official photograph taken by the camera person infront of the helicopter.... we saw the photo on the tv screen and we really liked it.... so we agreed to pay $10 digital for the photo happily... But when we received the photo.... it was totally dark and the automatic photoshop colors that they had shown on the screen dissappeared from the photo... it was totally dark... When the lady at the counter tried to download it again from their photoshop feature... it saved without the colors and editing... It is a waste to buy the photo if it doesnt come with the natural editing on its own... No use then buying a dark photo as no matter what you do... your own iPhone pro max cant put those colors and brightness no matter how much you try. Please do fix this issue. Rest everything was absolutely amazing. Must try !!!!!

reviews.title: Brilliant heli ride.  Thank you.
text: Absolutely brilliant from start to finish.  Flying high with an amazing girlie pilot who took us over and around Toronto.  The whole crew were friendly and extremely professional.  All safety aspects were explained before we took off and we were escorted to our helicopter and picked up on landing.  My hubby thoroughly enjoyed his birthday surprise. Would definitely recommend, it's worth every penny.  Thank you all for an amazing experience.

reviews.title: Great experience and price.
text: We go on helicopter tours whenever we can on our holidays. I'm a photographer and like to get clear shots, which are not always possible, as the helicopter canopy is usually dirty/scratched. Not on this helicopter - the windows were crystal clear and we got some great shots. Our lady pilot was very professional and we saw everything we wanted to during the flight. The ground crew were very pleasant and helpful too. You are normally only allowed to take a small camera or smartphone with you, but the let me take my heavy SLR. We did the romantic jewel tour, which included a photo by the helicopter. I would recommend these guys to anyone visiting Toronto. We'll be back!

reviews.title: Great experience
text: Wonderfully organized and smooth and safe. Great views. Helpful and skilful pilot who flew us over our home.

reviews.title: Helicopter tour
text: It was very nice trip ! With beautiful whether  and view .
I would definitely do it again .
Antonio

reviews.title: Awesome First Time Experience
text: From the welcoming crew to the pilot, everyone was super friendly and went above and beyond to make this first time experiencing an enjoyable one.

reviews.title: Incredible Tour
text: I treated my friend to the tour for her birthday! What a fantastic tour! The view, the ride - the turn in your stomach when banking!! The pilot -Emily..wonderfully calm. Would definitely do again!

reviews.title: Fun-tastic Experience
text: I was actually hesitant at first due to my fear of heights. But because all the staff were very friendly and helpful, I chose to conquer my fear. Thus, my husband and I enjoyed the ride as well as the breathtaking views. It was such a fun-tastic experience ever! No regrets.

reviews.title: Fun experience.
text: Great experience and friendly staff.  Booked a 14min flight, but it was a little choppy.  We asked mid flight to change to a 7min flight.  They accommodated and gave a refund for the un-used portion.

reviews.title: Heli Tours Toronto
text: This was an awesome present for my son's 13th birthday.  He loved it, the staff were very kind and friendly and the views of Toronto were amazing.  Would definitely recommend and do this again.

reviews.title: Toronto helicopter tour
text: I had helicopter tour in Toronto, everything was perfect, staff was super friendly, flight was amazing experience I never had before. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.title: Joy ride
text: A big thank you to the complete team. Very professional approach right from the time you enter the Hangar till you back from the joy ride. The pilot was fantastic very welcoming. The ground crew very professional on the apron. The reservation team was amazing, guided us all the way to the hangar. They booked me on a earlier schedule without any second thought. Would like to fly again with them

reviews.title: Hassle Free Ride
text: Everything is taken careof. You just need to be at the airport on time and rest will be taken care. All over the tour is exciting except the choopper is small

reviews.title: On top of Toronto
text: We loved the experience!! It felt amazing to be on top of the world and go higher than the CN tower. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Tour
text: It was a short tour for the price but we enjoyed it. The crew were fantastic. It was a great birthday treat.

reviews.title: Great experience
text: It was an overall great experience. Service was also great, they communicated well about any delays due to weather and also communicate ahead of time to make sure you have all the information you need to find them. Would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Epic experience
text: Sunset helicopter ride over Toronto! What to get someone who has everything! The view of the city is pure magic on the sunset helicopter tour , complimentary photos in frames a bottle of wine and wine glasses chocolates and stuffed animals ! This place thought of everything ! Book your tour now you will not be disappointed ! 10/10 experience of a lifetime

reviews.title: We have book private romantic jewel.Ride was fun but big NO to photographer.she gave us literally less than 3 seconds.No
text: Photographer did not gave us enough time. Less than 3 seconds.
No time for pose
No time to look for photos
No time for any other photos.
She took pictures the way she like and that the only option you have.
As well only 1 picture.
Again literally less than 3 seconds for photos.
For you might fuel of Chopper in calculation. But someone has their special day.
At least they deserve 30 second yo choose different angle and pose of pictures.

reviews.title: Amazing experience
text: The views were amazing, it  met the expectations. Would recommend anyone who is after kind of unusual city view experience!

reviews.title: 7  Minute Helicopter Tour breath taking views
text: I  booked the Helicopter Tour in advance from the UK before I went to canada for a holiday, the Helicopter Tour is well worth doing and all the places get booked up quickly  when I got to the Toronto airport my handbag and personal belongings were put into a secure lock up place and was given the key  I was shown a video on the safety before doing the helicopter tour,  you are taken out to the helicopter by some lovely staff The Helicopter Tour was fantastic and breath taking such beautiful scenery for miles and miles, after the helicopter tour and the helicopter has landed the staff come up to the helicopter and help you out of the helicopter and  a photo is taken by the staff  the photo is included in the price, you are given a choice of what photo you would like  I would recommend doing this Helicopter Tour

reviews.title: Amazing
text: Easy to book . Very quick but totally worthy experience. We were luck the weather was great so got lovely pictures
Well organised and  very friendly staff.

reviews.title: A must do when visiting Toronto!
text: Great Helicopter flight! Got to see all of Toronto and loved the flight. The tour company are great, everyone was friendly and really helpful, got all the information I needed and they made it a very special flight! Really highly recommended!

reviews.title: Helitours Toronto
text: It was an amazing experience! Our little daughter (4.5 years old) had a blast! Pilot was very professional! Views were amazing! Staff is very friendly also. Highly recommend this place!

reviews.title: Really great helicopter trip
text: This trip was fantastic, my son & I really enjoyed it. The staff and pilot were very friendly and helpful, and we took some incredible photos and videos of Toronto. I would definitely recommend this tour to anybody

reviews.title: WE LOVE IT!
text: The Heli Tour crew were INCREDIBLE! My boyfriend and I were stuck in traffic trying to make it to our reservation and they were beyond accommodating to our situation. The check in was super easy and the staff were attentive, kind, and super helpful. The tour was incredible and the view of the city was beautiful. 100000/10 would recommend! We can‚Äôt wait to do it again.

reviews.title: Romantic Tour
text: Took the romantic tour. Was absolutely amazing. Have never experienced this before and would highly recommend. The staff guided us through every step of the process and experience.

reviews.title: Superb Helicopter Flight
text: Couldn't have asked for a better day, weather wise. Blue skies, so excellent visibility to soak up the views. The ground crew and of course, the pilot, were thoroughly professional.
Well worth the money. The 7 minute flight was enough for us personally.
So Toronto Heli Tours. THANK YOU.
For the flight, and for keeping us safe.
Ian. Sarah & James

reviews.title: Surprise your teenager with this gift!
text: Perfect plan to celebrate my son‚Äôs 16th birthday.

The flight indeed takes 7 minutes (not less, not more). I thought it was going to be too short to enjoy, but was mistaken. The views are incredible and the affordable price (for such an adventure) is worth every penny.
